column2: No one digs like this guy. Don't even try, you'll lose.
column3: Only attacks Metal, with Critical chance!
column4: Gains extra money when defeating enemies!

column2: The way he picks up dirt is just... glorious.

column4: Gains extra money when defeating enemies!

column2: Digging the perfect hole is a divine act, he says.
